title: DevFest Berlin 2016 in pictures
brief: Thanks to our wonderful photographer Dana (be moody photography) we were all able to relive DevFest Berlin 2015 in pictures - over 400 to be concrete.

title: Call for Participation
brief: GDG DevFest Berlin 2017 has been announced! It will take on **November 3-5** in a sexy city of Berlin. That means that it is time to open call for talk submissions. Submission deadline is 20.10.2017
